view

Class Members

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.Members

  • public class Members
extends java.lang.Object
    The view package class which handles all the user's input/output operations about adding and updating members.
    Author:
    Mouayed Fakhreldin, Abdilrahman Duale, Genet Shiferaw

    • Method Detail

      • checkListChoice

        public void checkListChoice(java.lang.String s,
                            Message message)
        Checks if the list choice input is valid (Verbose list or compact list)
        Parameters:
        s - the user's input
        message - the validation message

      • checkChoice

        public void checkChoice(java.lang.String s,
                        Message message)
        Checks if the main menu choice input is valid
        Parameters:
        s - the user's input
        message - the validation message

      • checkPersonalNumberCreate

        public void checkPersonalNumberCreate(java.lang.String personalNumber,
                                      Message message)
        Checks if the personal number the user inputs for creating a memaber is valid. Personal number needs to be a 10 digit number.
        Parameters:
        personalNumber - The personal number to be checked
        message - The validation message.

      • checkSearchMemberInput

        public void checkSearchMemberInput(java.lang.String s,
                                   Message message)
        Checks that user's input for searching for a member by personal number is valid. This method checks that the input is a valid personal number and that database has a member stored with this personal number
        Parameters:
        s - The user's input
        message - The validation message.

      • updateName

        void updateName()
        Update member's name screen

      • deleteMember

        boolean deleteMember()
        Deletes a member screen. Confirms with the user if he/she is sure about removing membership
        Returns:
        true if the user has confirmed to remove the member
